title: 353: Bekah Hates Her Crush + Flirting Game 101
itunes:title: 353: Bekah Hates Her Crush + Flirting Game 101
description:
The Broads have fun with this one - they chat lucid dreaming, Jess suspecting Bekah is psychic, Bekah’s premonitions about Jess, a big crush update, dating your ex, Bekah gets hit on and hates it, flirting stories and Jess’ jealousy, what to do when a partner’s ex is acting a “certain” way in front of you, and much more! Then they start playing “We’re Not Really Strangers” and it gets giggly and then deep quickly! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box!
